text: Jarków () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lewin Kłodzki, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-west of Lewin Kłodzki, west of Kłodzko, and south- west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Jarków
